titleInfo.title: Another note on a theorem of Minc on irreducible nonegative matrices

mods.abstract: A short proof is given for a part of a theorem of Minc.

bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: L. Elsner, “Another note on a theorem of Minc on irreducible nonegative matrices”, Linear and multilinear algebra, 1978, 6, 61-62.
